<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Creative Prodigy](/Feats.aspx?ID=7199) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 53

**Prerequisites**
[Proteankin](/Feats.aspx?ID=7198)

</column>

---

You have a powerful creative drive that is clear to any who interact with you. You are trained in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45). If you were already trained in Performance (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the [Impressive Performance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5159) skill feat, and when you use Performance to Make an Impression, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.
name: Creative Prodigy
